title: following sentence, “This Order shall cease to have effect after the first day of
heading: 1. This order may be cited as the Irish Aviation Authority (Fees) Order
text_raw:
1. This order may be cited as the Irish Aviation Authority (Fees) Order 

2015 (Revocation) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited irish aviation authority (fees) order 2015 (revocation) order 2024

title: following sentence, “This Order shall cease to have effect after the first day of
heading: 2. The Irish Aviation Authority (Fees) Order 2015, (S.I. No. 523 of 2015)
text_raw:
2. The Irish Aviation Authority (Fees) Order 2015, (S.I. No. 523 of 2015) 
is hereby amended by the insertion after the first sentence in paragraph 2 of the 
following sentence, “This Order shall cease to have effect after the first day of 
January 2024.”
text_norm: 2 irish aviation authority (fees) order 2015 (s.i no 523 2015) hereby amended insertion first sentence paragraph 2 following sentence order shall cease effect first day january 2024

title: following sentence, “This Order shall cease to have effect after the first day of
heading: 3. The Irish Aviation Authority (Fees) Order 2015, (S.I. No. 523 of 2015)
text_raw:
3. The Irish Aviation Authority (Fees) Order 2015, (S.I. No. 523 of 2015) 

is hereby revoked. 

Present when the common seal of the Irish Aviation Authority 

was affixed hereto 
 8 February 2024 

ROSE HYNES, 
Director 

DECLAN FITZPATRICK, 

Director 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 1st March, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [80] 3
text_norm: 3 irish aviation authority (fees) order 2015 (s.i no 523 2015) hereby revoked present common seal irish aviation authority affixed hereto 8 february 2024 rose hynes director declan fitzpatrick director notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 1st march 2024 80 3

title: following sentence, “This Order shall cease to have effect after the first day of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order firstly amends the IAA (Fees) Order 2015, inserting an expiry date 
after which the fees set out therein shall not be applied. Secondly, the Order 
then revokes the 2015 Order. Pursuant to s.44 of the Irish Aviation Authority 
Act,1993, as amended by section 71 of the Air Navigation and Transport Act, 
2022, the Irish Aviation Authority may charge such amounts as it considers 
appropriate as provided for in the Act. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [80]
